SELECT
FROM home a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

select t1.name,t1.domain, IFNULL(clicked, 0) clicked, IFNULL(ip,0) ip, IFNULL(visitor,0) visitor, IFNULL(clicked2, 0) clicked2, IFNULL(ip2,0) ip2, IFNULL(visitor2,0) visitor2 from (SELECT b.name,b.domain, COUNT(1) clicked,COUNT(DISTINCT a.ip) ip,COUNT(DISTINCT a.sessionid) visitor FROM t_d_counts a ,t_d_sites b WHERE TIME > #{currentDate} AND a.siteid=b.id GROUP BY b.name) t1 left join (SELECT b.name, COUNT(1) clicked2,COUNT(DISTINCT a.ip) ip2,COUNT(DISTINCT a.sessionid) visitor2 FROM t_d_counts a ,t_d_sites b WHERE TIME > #{lastDate} AND TIME < #{currentDate} AND a.siteid=b.id GROUP BY b.name) t2 on t1.name=t2.name
